00018 #ifndef OBOLTZMANN_H
00019 #define OBOLTZMANN_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00022 
00023 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00024 
00034 class Oboltzmann : public QMCalculator
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     Oboltzmann() {}
00038     ~Oboltzmann() {}
00039 
00040     //const char *Description() { return "Site occupations as a Boltzmann distribution of site energies"; }
00041 
00042     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00043     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00044 private:
00045     double _kT;
00046 };
00047 
00048 inline void Oboltzmann::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options)
00049 {
00050      double temp= options->get("options.calc_rates.temperature").as<double>();
00051     _kT=temp*8.6173324e-5;
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline bool Oboltzmann::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top)
00055 {
00056     double Ptot = 0;
00057     vector<QMCrgUnit *> lcharges = top->CrgUnits();
00058     vector<QMCrgUnit *>::iterator itl;
00059 
00060 
00061     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00062         double p = exp(-((*itl)->getTotalEnergy()) / _kT);
00063         Ptot +=p;
00064         (*itl)->setOccupationProbability(p);
00065     }
00066     for (itl = lcharges.begin(); itl!=lcharges.end(); ++itl) {
00067         (*itl)->setOccupationProbability(
00068                 (*itl)->getOccupationProbability() / Ptot);
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 }}
00073 
00074 #endif  /* OBOLTZMANN_H */
